CHAPTER ONE Harper Ten . Whole . Minutes . It did n’t sound like a long time , but as [I]0-i sat across from [Max King]74-max , [the so - called King of [Wall Street]4-wall street]214-the so - called king of wall street , while [he]74-max silently read through the first draft of a report [I]0-i ’d produced on the textile industry in [Bangladesh]5-bangladesh , it felt like a lifetime . Resisting the urge to revert to [[my]0-i fourteen - year - old self]215-my fourteen - year - old self and ask [him]74-max what [he]74-max was thinking , [I]0-i glanced around , trying to find something else to fixate on . [[Max]74-max ’s office]216-max ’s office suited [him]74-max perfectly — the A / C was set to the average temperature of an igloo ; the walls , ceilings , and floors were all blinding white , adding to the arctic ambience . [His]74-max desk was glass and chrome , and the [New York]6-new york sun bled through the opaque blinds , trying without success to thaw the frost that penetrated [the room]217-the room . [I]0-i hated it . Every time [I]0-i entered [the place]218-the place [I]0-i had the urge to flash [my]0-i bra or graffiti the walls in bright red lipstick . It was the place fun came to die . [Max]74-max ’s sigh pulled [my]0-i attention back to [his]74-max long index finger that [he]74-max trailed down the page of [my]0-i research . [He]74-max shook [his]74-max head . [My]0-i stomach somersaulted . [I]0-i knew impressing [him]74-max would be an impossible task but that did n’t mean [I]0-i had n’t secretly hoped [I]0-i ’d nailed it . [I]0-i ’d worked so hard on this report , [my]0-i first research for the [Max King]74-max . [I]0-i ’d barely slept , working double so [I]0-i did n’t neglect [my]0-i other duties in [the office]219-the office . [I]0-i ’d printed off and examined everything that had been written on the industry in the last decade . [I]0-i ’d pored over the statistics , trying to find patterns and draw conclusions . And [I]0-i ’d scoured [the King & Associates archives]220-the king & associates archives trying to find any historical research that [we]221-we ’d produced so [we]221-we could explain any inconsistencies . [I]0-i ’d covered every base , had n’t [I]0-i ? When [I]0-i ’d printed it out earlier that morning , long before [anyone else]222-anyone else had arrived , [I]0-i ’d been happy — proud even . [I]0-i ’d done a good job . “ [You]0-i spoke to [Marvin]75-marvin about the latest data ? ”[74-max] [he]74-max asked . [I]0-i nodded , though [he]74-max did n’t look up , so [I]0-i said , “ Yes . All the graphs are based on the latest figures . ”[0-i] Did they look wrong ? Had [he]74-max expected something else ? [I]0-i just wanted [him]74-max to say , “ Good job . ”[74-max] [I]0-i ’d been desperate to work for [Max King]74-max since before [I]0-i enrolled at [business school]223-business school . [He]74-max was [the power behind the throne of many of the Wall Street success stories in the last few years]224-the power behind the throne of many of the wall street success stories in the last few years . [King & Associates]225-king & associates provided [investment banks]226-investment banks with critical research that helped [their]226-investment banks investment decisions . [I]0-i liked the idea that there were a ton of flashy suits from [investment banks]226-investment banks shouting about how rich [they]226-investment banks were and [the man who had made it happen]228-the man who had made it happen was happy to go quietly about [his]74-max business , just being amazing at what [he]74-max did . Understated , determined , supremely successful — [he]74-max was everything [I]0-i wanted to be . When [I]0-i got the offer during [my]0-i final semester to be [a junior researcher]229-a junior researcher at [King & Associates]11-king & associates , [I]0-i was thrilled , but [I]0-i also felt an odd sense that [the universe]230-the universe was simply unravelling how it should , as though it was simply the next step in [my]0-i destiny . [Destiny]76-destiny could kiss [my]0-i ass . [My]0-i first six weeks in [my]0-i new position had been nothing [I]0-i ’d expected . [I]0-i ’d assumed [I]0-i ’d be surrounded by [ambitious , intelligent , well - dressed twenty and thirty somethings]231-ambitious , intelligent , well - dressed twenty and thirty somethings and [I]0-i ’d been right about that . And [the clients [we]233-we worked for]232-the clients we worked for — [almost every investment bank in [Manhattan]8-manhattan]234-almost every investment bank in manhattan — were phenomenal and lived up to every expectation [I]0-i ’d had . [Max King]74-max , however , had turned out to be a huge letdown . The fact was , despite being crazy smart , respected by [everyone on [Wall Street]4-wall street]235-everyone on wall street , and looking as if [he]74-max should have been on a poster on teenage [me]0-i ’s bedroom wall , [he]74-max was . . . Cold . Blunt . Uncompromising . [A total asshole]236-a total asshole . [He]74-max was as handsome in real life as [he]74-max was in [his]74-max picture on the cover of Forbes or any of the other publicity shots [I]0-i ’d clicked through as [I]0-i stalked [him]74-max during [my]0-i MBA at [Berkeley]9-berkeley . One morning , [I]0-i ’d arrived super early , seen [him]74-max in [his]74-max running gear — sweaty , panting , Lycra clad . Thighs so strong they looked as if they might be made of marble . Broad shoulders ; a strong Roman nose ; dark - brown , glossy hair — the kind wasted on [a man]237-a man — and a year - round tan that screamed , [I]0-i vacation four times a year . In [the office]219-the office [he]74-max wore custom suits . Handmade suits fell a particular way on the shoulders that [I]0-i recognized from the few meetings [I]0-i ’d had with [[my]0-i father]239-my father . [His]74-max face and body lived up to every expectation [I]0-i ’d had . Working with [him]74-max , not so much . [I]0-i had n’t expected [him]74-max to be such [a tyrant]240-a tyrant . Each morning , as [he]74-max swooped through the throng of open - plan desks to [[his]74-max office]241-his office , [he]74-max never so much as greeted any of [us]242-us with a good morning . [He]74-max regularly yelled into [his]74-max phone so loud [he]74-max could be heard from [the elevator lobby]243-the elevator lobby . And last Tuesday ? When [I]0-i ’d passed [him]74-max in [the office]219-the office and smiled at [him]74-max , the veins in [his]74-max neck began to bulge and [he]74-max looked as if [he]74-max was going to reach out and choke [me]0-i . [I]0-i smoothed [my]0-i palms down the fabric of [my]0-i Zara skirt . Perhaps [I]0-i irritated [him]74-max because [I]0-i was n’t as sleek as [the other women in [the office]219-the office]245-the other women in the office . [I]0-i did n’t dress in the regulation Prada . Did [I]0-i look as though [I]0-i did n’t care ? [I]0-i just could n’t afford anything better at the moment . As [the most junior member of [the team]248-the team]247-the most junior member of the team , [I]0-i was at the bottom of the pecking order . Which meant [I]0-i knew [Mr. King]77-mr. king ’s sandwich order , how to untangle the photocopier , and [I]0-i had every courier company on speed dial . But that was to be expected and [I]0-i was just happy because [I]0-i got to work with [the guy [I]0-i ’d looked up to and admired for years]249-the guy i ’d looked up to and admired for years . And here [he]74-max was , shaking [his]74-max head and wielding a pen with the reddest ink [I]0-i ’d ever seen . With each circle , crisscross , and exaggerated question mark [he]74-max made , [I]0-i seemed to shrink . “ Where are [your]0-i references ? ”[74-max] [he]74-max asked without looking up . References ? When [I]0-i looked at the other reports [we]250-we produced , [they]251-they never had the sources in the report . “ [I]251-they have them back at [my]251-they desk — ”[251-they] “ Did [you]251-they speak to [Donny]78-donny ? ”[74-max] “ [I]74-max ’m waiting to hear back from [him]78-donny . ”[74-max] [He]74-max looked up and [I]0-i tried not to wince . [I]74-max heard [[your]74-max guys]1948-your guys are putting pressure on the EU ? ”[74-max] [Max]74-max did n’t put the phone on speaker , so [I]0-i watched as [he]74-max scribbled notes over [my]0-i paper . “ It would really help for this thing [I]74-max ’m doing about [Bangladesh]5-bangladesh . ”[74-max] [Max]74-max grinned , looked up briefly , caught [my]0-i eye , and looked away as if just the sight of [me]0-i irritated [him]74-max . Great . [Max]74-max hung up . “ [I]74-max put in two calls — ”[74-max] “ Results , not effort , get rewarded , ”[74-max] [he]74-max said in a clipped tone . So [he]74-max gave no credit for trying ? What could [I]0-i have done other than turn up at [[the guy]254-the guy ’s place of business]256-the guy ’s place of business ? [I]0-i was n’t [Max King]74-max .
